alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:20PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Elder County through 700 PM MDT... At 619 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plymouth, or 14 miles north of Tremonton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Plymouth, Riverside, Garland, Elwood, Fielding, Deweyville, Portage, Washakie, Collinston, Bothwell and Thatcher. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 378 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 29 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
